interface.name: greenisland_screenshooter

description.summary: dump the contents of an output to a buffer

interface.description: This interface is used by programs to take a screenshot of an output. Output contents are dumped into a buffer that is read by the screenshot application and saved as an image file. The done event is sent when the buffer is filled.

request.name: shoot
request.description: Ask the compositor to terminate a Wayland client with the specified application identifier.

event.name: done

description.summary: emitted when the buffer is filled

event.description: This event is sent when the buffer is filled and the screenshot has been done.
